events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position and queued it for review.
The application was categorised under Engineering based on the keywords like software and developer in the resume.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles was assigned to handle the candidate's application moving forward.
The candidate successfully completed the initial screening, demonstrating strong fundamentals and relevant experience.
The candidate responded promptly and positively to the screening feedback and expressed enthusiasm for the next steps.
A technical interview was scheduled with the candidate for next week to assess coding and problem-solving skills in depth.
